name: Magic pot (GameJamPumpkin)
description:
A game based on the fairy tale of the brothers grimm about the magic pot.

Management is as simple as possible:

WASD - to move.

Q - to open the description of the current task. 

I - to open the inventory.

E - to interact.

There are no enemies in the game, but it will definitely not work the first time. The main enemy is me, because it was I who made the controls in the current form and leveled the design.

Good luck!
